description.brazilian: Iniciar um novo jogo e chegar à primeira caixa espiritual ileso.
description.czech: Začněte novou hru a dostaňte se k prvnímu boxu s Ryzím duchem nezraněni.
description.english: Start a new game and reach the first spirit box unharmed.
description.french: Commence une nouvelle partie et atteins la boite centrale indemne.
description.german: Beginne ein neues Spiel und erreiche die erste goldene Box ohne Schaden.
description.hungarian: Indíts új játékot és érd el az első lélek dobozt sértetlenül.
description.italian: Inizia un nuovo gioco e raggiungi il box centrale senza essere colpito
description.japanese: 新しくゲームを開始し、一度もダメージを受けることなく癒しの精霊のスピリットボックスに到達する。
description.koreana: 새로 시작해서 한대도 맞지 않고 정신체에 도착하시오.
description.portuguese: Começar um novo jogo e alcançar a caixa central impune.
description.russian: Начните новую игру и доберитесь до золотого куба целым и невредимым.
description.schinese: 新开一局游戏，抵达存盘地点前不受任何伤害。
description.spanish: Empezar una nueva partida y llegar hasta la caja central sin ser herido.
description.tchinese: 展開新的遊戲並毫髮無傷地抵達中央方塊

displayName.czech: MOKRÁ PODLAHA, DEJ POZOR, KAM ŠLAPEŠ
displayName.hungarian: NEDVES PADLÓ, NÉZZ A LÁBAD ELÉ

description.brazilian: Não tocar o chão nem as escadas por 18 segundos
description.czech: Po dobu 18 sekund se nedotýkejte země nebo žebříků.
description.english: Do not touch the ground or ladders for 18 seconds.
description.french: Ne pas toucher le sol ou les échelles pendant 18 secondes.
description.german: Berühre weder den Boden noch eine Leiter für 18 Sekunden.
description.hungarian: Ne érintsd a földet vagy létrákat 18 másodpercig.
description.italian: Non toccare terra o gradoni per 18 secondi.
description.japanese: 地面やはしごに触れないまま、18秒が経過する。
description.portuguese: Não tocar no chão ou escadas durante 18 segundos.
description.russian: Не прикасайтесь к полу и лестницам в течение 18 секунд.
description.schinese: 在至少十八秒的时间内，不能触碰地面或者楼梯。
description.spanish: No tocar el suelo ni escaleras durante 18 segundos.
description.tchinese: 在任意的18秒內不要碰到地面或梯子

displayName.japanese: ポーションコレクター

description.brazilian: Carregar uma coleção de pelo menos 18 poções diferentes ao mesmo tempo.
description.czech: Nasbírejte kolekci alespoň osmnácti různých lektvarů.
description.english: Carry a collection of at least 18 different potions at once.
description.french: Possède une collection d'au moins 18 potions différentes.
description.german: Trage eine Sammlung von mindestens 18 verschiedenen Tränken bei Dir.
description.hungarian: Vigyél magaddal legalább 18 különböző italt egyszerre.
description.italian: Colleziona almeno 18 differenti pozioni.
description.japanese: 18種類以上のポーションを同時に所持する。
description.portuguese: Possuir uma colecção de pelo menos 18 poções diferentes.
description.russian: Соберите коллекцию из 18 различных зелий.
description.schinese: 随身携带十八种不同的药剂。
description.spanish: Poseer una colección de al menos 18 pociones diferentes.
description.tchinese: 蒐集至少18種不同的藥水

description.brazilian: Completar a sala das armadilhas em 50 segundos sem receber dano.
description.czech: Dokončete místnost s pastmi nezraněni a do padesáti sekund.
description.english: Complete the room of traps unharmed in 50 seconds.
description.french: Complète la pièce pleine de pièges sans te faire toucher en 50 secondes.
description.german: Vollende den Raum der Fallen unverletzt innerhalb 50 Sekunden.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a csapdák termét sértetlenül 50 másodperc alatt.
description.italian: Completa la stanza delle trappole senza essere colpito, in 50 secondi.
description.japanese: 罠の部屋を50秒以内かつ、ダメージを受けずに走破する
description.portuguese: Completar a sala das armadilhas impune em 50 segundos.
description.russian: Пройдите квест с ловушками за 50 секунд, не получив при этом урона.
description.schinese: 在五十秒内，不受任何伤害的情况下完成陷阱之屋的任务。
description.spanish: Completar la habitación de las trampas en 50 segundos sin ser herido.
description.tchinese: 在50秒之內毫髮無傷地完成陷阱房任務

description.brazilian: Derrotar Gauntlik enquanto estiver carregando 8 vampiros no inventário.
description.czech: Poražte Gauntlika s 8 upíry v inventáři.
description.english: Defeat Gauntlik while carrying 8 vampires in your inventory.
description.french: Tue Gauntlik en ayant 8 vampires dans ton inventaire.
description.german: Besiege Gauntlik mit 8 Vampiren in Deinem Inventar.
description.hungarian: Győzd le Gauntlik-ot, miközben magadnál tartasz 8 vámpírt.
description.italian: Uccidi Gauntlik portando 8 pipistrelli-vampiro nell'inventario.
description.japanese: 吸血コウモリを8匹インベントリに入れたまま、ガントリックを倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrotar Gauntlik carregando 8 vampiros no inventário.
description.russian: Победите Гантлига, имея 8 вампиров за пазухой.
description.schinese: 在身上有八只蝙蝠的情况下，击败金属手套甘提雷克(实验室守护者)。
description.spanish: Acaba con Gauntlik llevando 8 vampiros en el inventario.
description.tchinese: 身上帶著8隻吸血蝙蝠擊敗金屬手套高里剋

description.brazilian: Não beber nenhuma poção até derrotar a minhoca Dynidon.
description.czech: Nevypijte žádný lektvar, dokud neporazíte červa Dynidona.
description.english: Do not drink any potions until you have defeated the Dynidon worm.
description.french: Ne boit aucune potion avant d'avoir terrassé Dynidon le ver.
description.german: Trinke keinen einzigen Trank bis Du den Dynidonwurm besiegt hast.
description.hungarian: Ne használj egyetlen italt sem, mialatt a Dynidon féreggel harcolsz.
description.italian: Non bere nessuna pozione fino a sconfiggere il verme Dynidon
description.japanese: ゲーム開始からダイナドンワーム討伐まで、ポーションを一切飲まずに進める。
description.portuguese: Não beber nenhuma poção até derrotar a Dynidon.
description.russian: Не выпейте ни капли зелья, пока не победите червя Дигидона.
description.schinese: 在击败大虫迪尼顿(矿井守护者)之前，不使用任何药剂。
description.spanish: No beber ninguna poción hasta derrotar al gusano Dynidon.
description.tchinese: 擊敗大蟲迪尼昂之前不要喝任何藥水

description.brazilian: Carregar 666 essências de cada cor, 666 moedas e 666 favores divinos ao mesmo tempo.
description.czech: V jeden okamžik u sebe mějte 666 esencí od každé barvy, 666 mincí a 666 božských přízní.
description.english: Carry 666 essences of each color, 666 coins and 666 divine favors at the same time.
description.french: Avoir 666 essences de chaque couleur, 666 pièces et 666 faveurs divines.
description.german: Trage 666 Essenzen jeder Farbe, 666 Goldstücke und 666 göttliche Gunst gleichzeitig bei Dir.
description.hungarian: Vigyél magaddal 666 esszenciát minden színből, 666 aranyat és 666 isteni szívességet egyszerre.
description.italian: Ottieni 666 essenze di ogni colore, 666 monete e 666 favori divini.
description.japanese: コイン、全てのエッセンス、神の恩恵をそれぞれ666枚(個)同時に所持する。
description.koreana: 각각의 정수 딱 666개 모으시오, 동전도 666개 은총도 666개.
description.portuguese: Possuir 666 essências de cada cor, 666 moedas e 666 favor divino.
description.russian: Соберите ровно 666 порций каждого порошка, 666 монет и 666 божьих милостей.
description.schinese: 携带的各种颜色魔法精华，神恩及金币的数量均为666。
description.spanish: Tener 666 esencias de cada tipo, 666 monedas y 666 favores divinos.
description.tchinese: 持有各種色彩魔法原素各666份以及666枚錢幣及666份神聖恩寵

description.brazilian: Derrotar Sux Mortis com nível de habilidade 1 em armadura e constituição.
description.czech: Poražte Sux Mortise se schopnostmi na úrovni 1 v brnění a konstituci.
description.english: Defeat Sux Mortis with skill level 1 in armor and constitution.
description.french: Tue Sux Mortis en ayant 1 point dans armure et constitution.
description.german: Besiege Sux Mortis solange Du bei Rüstung und Konstitution auf Level 1 bist.
description.hungarian: Győzd le Sux Mortist 1. szintű páncéllal és kitartással.
description.italian: Uccidi Sux Mortis mentre sei di livello 1 in armatura e costituzione
description.japanese: 鎧と体格のスキルが1の状態で、サクス・モーティスを倒す。
description.koreana: 석스 모티스를 갑옷, 체력 둘 다 레벨 1인 상태로 깨시오
description.portuguese: Derrotar Sux Mortis a nível 1 em armaduras e constituição.
description.russian: Победите Сакс Мортиса, имея лишь 1ый уровень навыков "броня" и "телосложение".
description.schinese: 在护甲和体质的技能等级都只有一级的情况下，击败死神萨克·莫提斯(墓穴守护者)。
description.spanish: Acabar con Sux Mortis teniendo nivel 1 en armaduras y en constitución.
description.tchinese: 在護甲和體格都只有等級1時擊敗屍魔帝

description.brazilian: Esquivar-se de todas as pedras entre as colunas, no corredor que leva à mina.
description.czech: Vyhněte se všem padajícím kamenům mezi sloupy v chodbě do dolu.
description.english: Dodge all falling rocks between the columns in the corridor to the mine.
description.french: Évite les chutes de pierre dans les corridors menant à la mine.
description.german: Weiche allen fallenden Steinen zwischen den Säulen im Korridor zur Mine aus.
description.hungarian: Térj ki az összes lehulló szikla elől a bányába vezető folyosón az oszlopok között.
description.italian: Schiva le rocce che cadono fra le colone nel corridoio per la miniera.
description.japanese: 鉱山の入り口の廊下で降ってくる岩石を、2本の柱の間で避け続ける。
description.koreana: 돌이 운지하는 광산쪽 회랑 한대도 안맞고 가시오.
description.portuguese: Esquivar-se das rochas nos corredores que levam às minas.
description.russian: Увернитесь от падающих камней на пути в шахту.
description.schinese: 在通往矿井的通道里，你需要在同一房间的两根立柱之间躲避所有的落石，确保在一分钟内不被砸伤。
description.spanish: Esquivar rocas entre las columnas del pasillo a la mina durante un minuto.
description.tchinese: 在前往礦坑的走廊上閃躲那些掉落的大石頭

description.brazilian: Derrotar Medeox sem matar nenhuma das cobras dele.
description.czech: Poražte Medeoxe bez toho, aniž byste zabili některého z jeho hadů.
description.english: Defeat Medeox without killing any of its snakes.
description.french: Térasser Medeox sans tuer aucun de ses serpents.
description.german: Besiege Medeox ohne eine der Schlangen zu töten.
description.hungarian: Győzd le Medeox-t anélkül, hogy megölnéd a kígyóit.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Medeox senza uccidere alcuno dei suoi serpenti.
description.japanese: 召喚された蛇を一匹も殺さずに、メドックスを倒す。
description.koreana: 메데옥스 머리의 뱀 한마리도 안죽이고 메데옥스 죽이시오.
description.portuguese: Derrotar Medeox sem matar nenhuma das suas cobras.
description.russian: Победите Мидекса, не убив ни одной из его змей.
description.schinese: 在不消灭他头上任何毒蛇的情况下，击败梅道科斯(礼堂守护者)。
description.spanish: Derrotar a Medeox sin matar a ninguna de sus serpientes.
description.tchinese: 擊敗梅杜歐但不殺死他頭上的任何蛇

description.brazilian: Matar Corvax, o Mago, no modo DIFÍCIL ou DIFÍCIL++.
description.czech: Zabijte Corvaxe Čarodějného v režimu TĚŽKÉ či TĚŽKÉ++ obtížnosti .
description.english: Kill Corvax the Mage in HARD or HARD++ mode.
description.french: Tuer Corvax le Mage en mode DIFFICILE ou DIFFICILE++.
description.german: Besiege Corvax den Magier auf Level SCHWER oder SEHR SCHWER++.
description.hungarian: Végezz Corvax-szal, a mágussal NEHÉZ vagy NEHÉZ++ módban.
description.italian: Uccidi Corvax il Mago in HARD o HARD++ mode.
description.japanese: ハードかハード++の難易度でコルヴァクスを倒す。
description.portuguese: Matar Corvax o Mago em modo DÍFICIL/DÍFICIL++.
description.russian: Убейте мага Корвакса на сложности "Тяжело"/"Тяжело++".
description.schinese: 在困难或者困难++的难度下，杀死大法师克瓦科斯(精灵BOSS)。
description.spanish: Acabar con Corvax el Mago en dificultad DIFÍCIL o DIFÍCIL++.
description.tchinese: 在困難或困難++模式中殺死大法師柯維

displayName.schinese: 几乎不可能完成的任务

description.brazilian: Chegar aos Cristais Gêmeos no modo DIFÍCIL++.
description.czech: Dostaňte se k Sesterským krystalům na obtížnost TĚŽKÁ++.
description.english: Reach the Twin Crystals in HARD++ mode.
description.french: Atteins les Tours de Crystales Jumelles en mode DIFFICILE++.
description.german: Erreiche die "Twin Crystals" im Level SEHR SCHWER++
description.hungarian: Érd el a páros kristályokat NEHÉZ++ módban.
description.italian: Raggiungi i Cristalli Gemelli in HARD++ mode.
description.japanese: ハード++難易度で二つのクリスタルに到達する。
description.portuguese: Chegar aos Cristais Gémeos em modo DÍFICIL++.
description.russian: Доберитесь до Кристаллов на сложности "Тяжело++".
description.schinese: 在困难++的难度下，到达两颗水晶所在的房间。
description.spanish: Llegar hasta los Cristales Gemelos en dificultad DIFÍCIL++.
description.tchinese: 在困難++模式中抵達雙水晶所在處

description.brazilian: Encontrar Harnakon sem matar nenhum corvo antes disso.
description.czech: Najděte Harnakona bez toho, aniž byste předtím zabili jakoukoli vránu.
description.english: Find Harnakon without killing any crows beforehand.
description.french: Trouve Harnakon sans avoir tué aucun corbeau auparavant.
description.german: Finde Harnakon ohne zuvor eine Krähe zu töten.
description.hungarian: Találd meg Harnakont anélkül, hogy előtte egyetlen varjat is megöltél volna.
description.italian: Trova Harnakon senza aver mai ucciso corvi.
description.japanese: カラスを１匹も殺すことなくハルナコンを探し出す。
description.koreana: 하나콘과 만나기 전까지 절대 까마귀를 죽이지 마시오.
description.portuguese: Encontrar Harnakon sem matar nenhum corvo.
description.russian: Найдите Харнэкона, не убив до этого ни одной вороны.
description.schinese: 在找到哈纳肯之前，不要杀死一只乌鸦。
description.spanish: Encontrar a Harnakon sin haber matado ningún cuervo.
description.tchinese: 找到哈爾納肯之前不要殺死任何烏鴉

description.brazilian: Levar 4 ou mais goblins libertos à mina sem usar teleporte nem portões.
description.czech: Bez použití teleportu či bran přiveďte do dolu alespoň 4 osvobozené gobliny.
description.english: Bring 4 or more freed goblins to the mine without using teleport or gates.
description.french: Amème 4 gobelins libérés, ou plus, à la mine sans utiliser la téléportation ou les portes.
description.german: Bringe 4 oder mehr der befreiten Goblins in die Minen ohne einen Teleporter oder ein Tor zu benutzen.
description.hungarian: Kísérj 4 vagy több kiszabadított goblint a bányába teleport és kapuk nélkül.
description.italian: Porta 4 o più Goblin liberati alla miniera senza usare teletrasporti o gates.
description.japanese: 解放したゴブリンを4匹以上、テレポートやゲートを使わず鉱山まで連れて行く。
description.koreana: 문이나 텔레포트를 이용하지 않고 4마리 이상의 고블린을 살려서 보내시오.
description.portuguese: Trazer 4 ou mais duendes da mina sem usar teleporte ou portais.
description.russian: Приведите как минимум 4х гоблинов в шахту без использования ворот и телепортации.
description.schinese: 在不用传送门或者其他捷径的情况下，护送你解救的四只以上(含四只)的地精返还矿井。
description.spanish: Llevar 4 o más goblins liberados a la mina sin usar ni teleportación ni puertas.
description.tchinese: 帶4個以上逃脫的哥布林抵達礦坑且不使用傳送門或任何捷徑

description.brazilian: Usar o martelo de brinquedo para desferir o golpe final em uma armadura viva.
description.czech: Použijte kladivo na hraní na poslední úder proti oživlému brnění.
description.english: Use the toy hammer to deal the final blow to a walking armor.
description.french: Utilise le marteau jouet pour donner le coup fatal à une armure errante.
description.german: Benutze einen Gummihammer, um den letzten Schlag gegen eine wandelnde Rüstung zu führen.
description.hungarian: Vidd be a végső csapást egy játék kalapáccsal egy járkáló páncélnak.
description.italian: Usa il martello giocattolo per dare il copo di grazia ad una armatura che cammina.
description.japanese: ウォーキングアーマーを倒す際、トドメの一撃にピコピコハンマーを使う。
description.koreana: 장난감 망치로 걸어다니는 갑옷의 막타를 갈기시오.
description.portuguese: Usar o martelo de brincar para dar o golpe final numa armadura andante.
description.russian: Нанесите игрушечным молотком смертельный удар ожившим доспехам.
description.schinese: 使用玩具锤，给某个活动的盔甲怪致命一击。
description.spanish: Usar un martillo de plástico para asestar el golpe de gracia a una armadura andante.
description.tchinese: 用玩具鎚結束盔甲怪（打最後一下即可）

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da área central.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the central area.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières dans la zone centrale.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter im Zentralbereich angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella zona centrale.
description.japanese: 中央エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в центральной области.
description.schinese: 你点亮了中央区域的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de la zona centro.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃中央區域的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da mina.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the mine.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières de la mine.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in der Mine angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella miniera.
description.japanese: 鉱山エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Шахте.
description.schinese: 你点亮了矿坑的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de la mina.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃礦坑的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes do subterrâneo.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the downs.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières du sous sol.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in den Tiefen angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nei bassifondi.
description.japanese: 下部エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Нижней области.
description.schinese: 你点亮了下层的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de los bajos.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃下層的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes dos esgotos.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the sewer.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières des égouts.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in der Kanalisation angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella fogna.
description.japanese: 下水道にある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Коллекторе.
description.schinese: 你点亮了下水道的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de las cloacas.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃下水道的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da área oeste.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the west zone.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières de la zone ouest.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter im westlichen Bereich angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella zona occidentale.
description.japanese: 西側エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Западной области.
description.schinese: 你点亮了西区的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de la zona oeste.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃西區的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes dos jardins.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the gardens.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières des jardins.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in den Gärten angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nei giardini.
description.japanese: 庭園エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Садах.
description.schinese: 你点亮了花园的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de los jardines.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃花園的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da área leste.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the east zone.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières de la zone est.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter im östlichen Bereich angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella zona est.
description.japanese: 東部エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Восточной области.
description.schinese: 你点亮了东区的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de la zona este.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃東區的所有燈火

displayName.japanese: 図書館エリア探索完了

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da biblioteca.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the library.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières de la librairie.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in der Bibliothek angezündet.

description.japanese: 図書館エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Библиотеке.
description.schinese: 你点亮了图书馆的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de la biblioteca.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃圖書館的所有燈火

displayName.brazilian: A TORRE DOS MAGOS ESTÁ ACESA
displayName.french: LA TOUR DES MAGES EST ÉCLAIRÉE
displayName.italian: LA TORRE DEI MAGHI È ILLUMINATA

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da torre dos magos.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the tower of the mages.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières de la tour des mages.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter im Turm der Magier angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella torre dei maghi.
description.japanese: 塔エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Башне Магов.
description.schinese: 你点亮了法师高塔的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de la torre de los magos.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃法師高塔的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da prisão.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the prison.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières de la prison.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter im Gefängnis angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella prigione.
description.japanese: 牢獄エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Тюрьме.
description.schinese: 你点亮了监狱的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de la prisión.
description.tchinese: 你已經點亮監牢的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes dos salões.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the halls.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières des grandes salles.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in den Hallen angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nei saloni.
description.japanese: 広間エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Палатах.
description.schinese: 你点亮了礼堂的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de los salones.
description.tchinese: 你已經點亮大廳的所有燈火

displayName.japanese: 研究所エリア探索完了

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes do laboratório.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the laboratory.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières du laboratoire.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter im Laboratorium angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nel laboratorio.
description.japanese: 研究所エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Лаборатории.
description.schinese: 你点亮了实验室的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces del laboratorio.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃實驗室的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes da torre esquecida.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the forgotten tower.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières de la tour oubliée.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter im Vergessenen Turm angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nella torre dimenticata.
description.japanese: 廃塔エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Заброшенной башне.
description.schinese: 你点亮了鬼魂高塔的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces del torreón.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃遺忘高塔的所有燈火

displayName.japanese: 地下墓地エリア探索完了

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes das catacumbas.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the catacombs.
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières des catacombes.
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in den Katakomben angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci nelle catacombe.
description.japanese: 地下墓地エリアにある、全ての光源を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли все огни в Катакомбах.
description.schinese: 你点亮了墓穴的所有光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido todas las luces de las catacumbas.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃墓穴的所有燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu um quarto das luzes de todo o castelo.
description.english: You have lit a quarter of all lights in the whole castle.
description.french: Tu as allumé un quart des lumières du château.
description.german: Du hast ein Viertel aller Lichter in der Burg angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso un quarto di tutte le luci dell'intero castello.
description.japanese: 城の全エリアにある、全光源のうち25%を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли 25% всех огней в замке.
description.schinese: 你已经点亮了城堡里四分之一的光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido un cuarto del total de las luces de todo el castillo.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃城堡的四分之一燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu metade das luzes de todo o castelo.
description.english: You have lit the half of all lights in the whole castle.
description.french: Tu as allumé la moitié des les lumières du château.
description.german: Du hast die Hälfte aller Lichter in der Burg angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso metà delle luci dell'intero castello.
description.japanese: 城の全エリアにある、全光源のうち50%を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли 50% всех огней в замке.
description.schinese: 你已经点亮了城堡里二分之一的光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido la mitad de todas las luces del castillo.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃城堡的半數燈火

description.brazilian: Você acendeu três quartos das luzes de todo o castelo.
description.english: You have lit three quarters of all lights in the whole castle.
description.french: Tu as allumé trois quart de toutes les lumières du château.
description.german: Du hast drei Viertel aller Lichter in der Burg angezündet.
description.italian: Hai acceso tre quarti delle luci dell'intero castello.
description.japanese: 城の全エリアにある、全光源のうち75%を灯した。
description.russian: Вы зажгли 75% всех огней в замке.
description.schinese: 你已经点亮了城堡里四分之三的光源。
description.spanish: Has encendido tres cuartas partes de las luces de todo el castillo.
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃城堡的四分之三燈火

displayName.french: LE CHÂTEAU EST ÉCLAIRÉ AU COMPLET

description.brazilian: Você acendeu todas as luzes do castelo.
description.english: You have lit all lights in the castle!!
description.french: Tu as allumé toutes les lumières du château!!
description.german: Du hast alle Lichter in der Burg angezündet!!
description.italian: Hai acceso tutte le luci del castello!!
description.japanese: 城にある全ての光源を灯し、探索を完了した！
description.russian: Вы зажгли все до единого огни в замке!!!
description.schinese: 你已经点亮了城堡里所有的光源！！
description.spanish: ¡¡Has encendido todas las luces del castillo!!
description.tchinese: 你已經點燃城堡的所有燈火！！

description.brazilian: Você passou no teste das armadilhas e obteve a Chave da mina.
description.english: You passed the test of traps and obtained the Key of the Mine.
description.french: Tu as réussi l'épreuve des pièges et obtenu la clef de la mine.
description.german: Du hast den Test der Fallen bestanden und den Schlüssel der Mine erhalten.
description.italian: Hai passato la prova delle trappole ed ottenuto la Chiave della Miniera.
description.japanese: トラップ部屋の試練を越えて、鉱山の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы прошли испытание ловушками и получили Ключ от Шахты.
description.schinese: 你通过了陷阱试炼，拿到了矿坑钥匙。
description.spanish: Has pasado la prueba de las trampas y has conseguido la llave de la mina.
description.tchinese: 你通過重重機關陷阱的考驗，並取得礦坑鑰匙

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o primeiro Guardião e obteve a Chave dos esgotos.
description.english: You have defeated the first Guardian and obtained the Key of the Sewer.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le premier Guardien et obtenu la Clef des Égouts.
description.german: Du hast den ersten Wächter besiegt und den Schlüssel der Kanalisation erhalten.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il primo Guardiano e ottenuto la Chiave della Fogna.
description.japanese: 1番目のガーディアンを倒し下水道の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы победили первого Стража и получили Ключ от Коллектора.
description.schinese: 你击败了第一个守护者，拿到了下水道钥匙。
description.spanish: Has vencido al primer guardián y has conseguido la llave de las cloacas.
description.tchinese: 你擊敗第一個守護者，並取得下水道鑰匙

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o segundo Guardião e obteve a Chave dos jardins.
description.english: You have defeated the second Guardian and obtained the Key of the Gardens.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le second Guardien et obtenu la Clef des Jardins.
description.german: Du hast den zweiten Wächter besiegt und den Schlüssel der Gärten erhalten.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il secondo Guardiano e ottenuto la Chiave dei Giardini.
description.japanese: 2番目のガーディアンを倒し庭園の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы победили второго Стража и получили Ключ от Сада.
description.schinese: 你击败了第二个守护者，拿到了花园钥匙。
description.spanish: Has vencido al segundo guardián y has conseguido la llave de los jardines.
description.tchinese: 你擊敗第二個守護者，並取得花園鑰匙

displayName.russian: КТО В ЛЕС, КТО ПО ДРОВА

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o terceiro Guardião e obteve a Chave da biblioteca.
description.english: You have defeated the third Guardian and obtained the Key of the Library.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le troisième Guardien et obtenu la Clef de la Librairie.
description.german: Du hast den dritten Wächter besiegt und den Schlüssel der Bibliothek erhalten.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il terzo Guardiano e ottenuto la Chiave della Biblioteca.
description.japanese: 3番目のガーディアンを倒し図書館の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы победили третьего Стража и получили Ключ от Библиотеки.
description.schinese: 你击败了第三个守护者，拿到了图书馆钥匙。
description.spanish: Has vencido al tercer guardián y has conseguido la llave de la biblioteca.
description.tchinese: 你擊敗第三個守護者，並取得圖書館鑰匙

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o quarto Guardião e obteve a Chave da catacumbas.
description.english: You have defeated the fourth Guardian and obtained the Key of the Catacombs.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le quatrième Guardien et obtenu la Clef des Catacombes.
description.german: Du hast den vierten Wächter besiegt und den Schlüssel der Katakomben erhalten.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il quarto Guardiano e ottenuto la Chiave delle Catacombe.
description.japanese: 4番目のガーディアンを倒し地下墓地の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы победили четвёртого Стража и получили Ключ от Катакомб.
description.schinese: 你击败了第四个守护者，拿到了墓穴钥匙。
description.spanish: Has vencido al cuarto guardián y has conseguido la llave de las catacumbas.
description.tchinese: 你擊敗第四個守護者，並取得墓穴鑰匙

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o quinto Guardião e obteve a Chave do laboratório.
description.english: You have defeated the fifth Guardian and obtained the Key of the Laboratory.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le cinquième Guardien et obtenu la Clef du Laboratoire.
description.german: Du hast den fünften Wächter besiegt und den Schlüssel des Laboratoriums erhalten.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il quinto Guardiano e ottenuto la Chiave del Laboratorio
description.japanese: 5番目のガーディアンを倒し研究所の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы победили пятого Стража и получили Ключ от Лаборатории.
description.schinese: 你击败了第五个守护者，拿到了实验室钥匙。
description.spanish: Has vencido al quinto guardián y has conseguido la llave del laboratorio.
description.tchinese: 你擊敗第五個守護者，並取得實驗室鑰匙

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o sexto Guardião e obteve a Chave dos salões.
description.english: You have defeated the sixth Guardian and obtained the Key of the Halls.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le sixième Guardien et obtenu la Clef des Grandes Salles.
description.german: Du hast den sechsten Wächter besiegt und den Schlüssel der Hallen erhalten.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il sesto Guardiano e ottenuto la Chiave dei Saloni
description.japanese: 6番目のガーディアンを倒し大広間の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы победили шестого Стража и получили Ключ от Палат.
description.schinese: 你击败了第六个守护者，拿到了礼堂钥匙。
description.spanish: Has vencido al sexto guardián y has conseguido la llave de los salones.
description.tchinese: 你擊敗第六個守護者，並取得大廳鑰匙

displayName.spanish: LA LLAVE DE LA TORRE DE LOS MAGOS

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o sétimo Guardião e obteve a Chave da torre.
description.english: You have defeated the seventh Guardian and obtained the Key of the Tower.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le septième Guardien et obtenu la Clef de la Tour.
description.german: Du hast den siebenten Wächter besiegt und den Schlüssel des Turms erhalten.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il settimo Guardiano e ottenuto la Chiave della Torre
description.japanese: 7番目のガーディアンを倒し塔の鍵を手に入れた。
description.russian: Вы победили седьмого Стража и получили Ключ от Башни.
description.schinese: 你击败了第七个守护者，拿到了遗忘之塔钥匙。
description.spanish: Has vencido al séptimo guardián y has conseguido la llave de la torre de los magos.
description.tchinese: 你擊敗第七個守護者，並取得高塔鑰匙

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão Pyros, espírito do fogo, e aprendeu os segredos da magia do fogo.
description.english: You successfully finished the quest of Pyros, spirit of fire, and acquired the knowledge of fire magic.
description.french: Tu as completé avec succès la quête de l'esprit, et obtenu l'aptitude magique du feu.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich die Aufgabe von Pyros, Geist des Feuers, erfüllt und Wissen über die Magie des Feuers erhalten.
description.italian: Hai completato con successo la missione di Pyros, lo spirito del fuoco ed acquisito la conoscenza della Magia del Fuoco.
description.japanese: 火の精霊、パイロスのクエストに無事成功し火炎魔法の知識を習得した。
description.russian: Вы успешно прошли испытание Чистейшего Духа и смогли обуздать огненную стихию.
description.schinese: 你成功地完成了火焰之灵派罗斯交托的任务，获取了火焰魔法知识。
description.spanish: Has acabado con éxito la quest de Pyros, espíritu del fuego, y logrado los conocimientos de la magia del fuego.
description.tchinese: 你成功完成火神派羅交付的任務，並習得火焰魔法的知識

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão do espírito e aprendeu os segredos da magia do gelo.
description.english: You successfully finished the quest of the spirit, and acquired the knowledge of frost magic.
description.french: Tu as completé avec succès la quête de l'esprit, et obtenu l'aptitude magique du froid.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich die Aufgabe des Geistes erfüllt, und Wissen über die Magie des Frostes erhalten.
description.italian: Hai completato con successo la missione dello spirito ed acquisito la conoscenza della Magia del Gelo
description.japanese: 精霊のクエストに無事成功し冷気魔法の知識を習得した。
description.russian: Вы успешно прошли испытание Чистейшего Духа и смогли обуздать ледяную стихию.
description.schinese: 你成功地完成了冰霜之灵交托的任务，获取了冰霜魔法的知识。
description.spanish: Has acabado con éxito la quest del espíritu del hielo.
description.tchinese: 你成功完成海神波賽頓交付的任務，並習得冰霜魔法的知識

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão do espírito e aprendeu os segredos da cura.
description.english: You successfully finished the quest of the spirit, and acquired the knowledge of Healing.
description.french: Tu as completé avec succès la quête de l'esprit, et obtenu l'aptitude de guérison.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich die Aufgabe des Geistes erfüllt, und Wissen über die Magie der Heilung erhalten.
description.italian: Hai completato con successo la missione dello spirito ed acquisito la conoscenza della Taumaturgia.
description.japanese: 精霊のクエストに無事成功し回復魔法の知識を習得した。
description.russian: Вы успешно прошли испытание Чистейшего Духа и обрели чудесный дар исцеления.
description.schinese: 你成功地完成了治疗之灵交托的任务，获取了治疗魔法的知识。
description.spanish: Has acabado con éxito la quest del espíritu de la curación.
description.tchinese: 你成功完成神靈交付的任務，並習得治療的知識

description.brazilian: Você encontrou o Deus da Luz e adquiriu o Favor Divino da Luz.
description.english: You found the God of Light, and acquired the Divine Favour of Light.
description.french: Tu as trouvé le Dieu de la Lumière, et obtenu la Faveur Divine de la Lumière.
description.german: Du hast den Gott des Lichtes gefunden, und die Göttliche Gunst des Lichtes erhalten.
description.italian: Hai trovato la divinità della luce ed acquisito il Favore Divino della Luce.
description.japanese: 光の神を発見し、神聖なる恩恵を受け取った。
description.russian: Вы отыскали Бога Света и получили его благословение и поддержку.
description.schinese: 你找到了光明之神，并获得了神的恩宠。
description.spanish: Has encontrado al Dios de la Luz y conseguido su favor divino.
description.tchinese: 你找到光明之神，並取得光明之神聖恩寵

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão do espírito e aprendeu os segredos da proteção.
description.english: You successfully finished the quest of the spirit, and acquired the knowledge of Protection.
description.french: Tu as completé avec succès la quête de l'esprit, et obtenu l'aptitude de Protection.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich die Aufgabe des Geistes erfüllt, und Wissen über den Schutz erhalten.
description.italian: Hai completato con successo la missione dello spirito ed acquisito la conoscenza della Magia della Protezione.
description.japanese: 精霊のクエストに無事成功し防御魔法の知識を習得した。
description.russian: Вы успешно прошли испытание Чистейшего Духа, и получили знания о Защите.
description.schinese: 你成功地完成了防护之灵交托的任务，获取了防护魔法的知识。
description.spanish: Has acabado con éxito la quest del espíritu de la protección.
description.tchinese: 你成功完成神靈交付的任務，並習得防護的知識

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão do espírito e aprendeu os segredos da alteração.
description.english: You successfully finished the quest of the spirit, and acquired the knowledge of Alteration.
description.french: Tu as completé avec succès la quête de l'esprit, et obtenu l'aptitude d'Altération.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich die Aufgabe des Geistes erfüllt, und Wissen über die Veränderung erhalten.
description.italian: Hai completato con successo la missione dello spirito ed acquisito la conoscenza della Magia della Trasformazione.
description.japanese: 精霊のクエストに無事成功し変化魔法の知識を習得した。
description.russian: Вы успешно прошли испытание Чистейшего Духа, и обрели способности к Изменению.
description.schinese: 你成功地完成了转化之灵交托的任务，获取了转化魔法的知识。
description.spanish: Has acabado con éxito la quest del espíritu de la magia de alteración.
description.tchinese: 你成功完成神靈交付的任務，並習得轉化的知識

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão do espírito e aprendeu os segredos do poder da mente.
description.english: You successfully finished the quest of the spirit, and acquired the knowledge of Mental Power.
description.french: Tu as completé avec succès la quête de l'esprit, et obtenu l'aptitude de force mentale.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich die Aufgabe des Geistes erfüllt, und das Wissen der Mentalen Macht erhalten.
description.italian: Hai completato con successo la missione dello spirito ed acquisito la conoscenza del Potere Mentale.
description.japanese: 精霊のクエストに無事成功し精神魔法の知識を習得した。
description.russian: Вы успешно прошли испытание Чистейшего Духа, и научились использовать в бою свой Разум.
description.schinese: 你成功地完成了精神之灵交托的任务，获取了心灵魔法的知识。
description.spanish: Has acabado con éxito la quest del espíritu de la mente.
description.tchinese: 你成功完成神靈交付的任務，並習得心靈力量的知識

description.brazilian: Você alcançou o nível 5.
description.english: You reached level 5.
description.french: Tu as atteint le niveau 5.
description.german: Du hast Stufe 5 erreicht.
description.italian: Raggiunto il livello 5.
description.japanese: レベル5達成。
description.russian: Вы достигли 5 уровня.
description.schinese: 你已经5级了。
description.spanish: Has alcanzado el nivel 5.
description.tchinese: 你到達第五級了

description.brazilian: Você alcançou o nível 10.
description.english: You reached level 10.
description.french: Tu as atteint le niveau 10.
description.german: Du hast Stufe 10 erreicht.
description.italian: Raggiunto il livello 10.
description.japanese: レベル10達成。
description.russian: Вы достигли 10 уровня.
description.schinese: 你已经10级了。
description.spanish: Has alcanzado el nivel 10.
description.tchinese: 你達到第十級了

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão do espírito e aprendeu os segredos da necromancia.
description.english: You successfully finished the quest of the spirit, and acquired the knowledge of Necromancy.
description.french: Tu as completé avec succès la quête de l'esprit, et obtenu l'aptitude de Necromancie
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich die Aufgabe des Geistes erfüllt, und Wissen über die Nekromantie erhalten.
description.italian: Hai completato con successo la missione dello spirito ed acquisito la conoscenza della Necromanzia.
description.japanese: 精霊のクエストに無事成功し死霊術の知識を習得した。
description.russian: Вы успешно прошли испытание Чистейшего Духа и обрели знание некромантии.
description.schinese: 你成功地完成了死亡之灵交托的任务，获取了亡灵魔法的知识。
description.spanish: Has acabado con éxito la quest del espíritu de la nigromancia.
description.tchinese: 你成功完成死靈交付的任務，並習得死靈法術的知識
